name: jhunt
text: And thus begins a spate of Achewood slash fanfic...

name: tehvirus
text: hahaha oh lord....

name: sweetlips
text: Ahaha, you're funny let's touch.

name: nathanielperson
text: It's the little details that make Achewood what it is. Like Ray's crack in panels 6 & 7.

name: cdl146
text: Or the little hole in his thong for his tail.

name: peterjoel
text: Should it be possible for Ray's crack to extend past his tail??!

name: ovenface
text:
oh noooooooooo

what if ray's tail was docked and the thong is just to hold a fake tail so he doesn't have to be embarassed about his tail stub? You can't even see his tail in this one !

nooooooooooo

name: canusdivinus
text: I don't think that's Ray running away there, but rather the other guy. They both have those rounded ears.

name: spinynorman
text: Ray's backside is funny to look at. Him turned away emanated just as much happy ignorance as the front.

name: holly_golightly
text: After re-reading the archives, I have noticed that the issue of Ray's crack vs. tail has come up on numerous occassions. I don't think that is his crack, but the top of his tail- a cat's tail extends straight from his back. This is just my theory, anyway.

name: gouldgonewild
text:
I like how his butt crack is above his tail?

I felt left out.

name: tehvirus
text:
Perhaps it is a tattoo of a buttcrack.
Because Ray is just THAT stylin'.

name: drycup
text: A comment left by drycup was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by alphagator, brzbee, Mastronaut)

name: riazm
text: Yo, Ray, what the fuck? You kiss everyone as they're waking up? What's the deal?

name: i_love_kate
text: Ray coasts the border of asleep style with a close one.

name: beansdooma
text: Why does Ray need to be on top of Beef to check on him in the first place?

name: zem
text: he's inserting the paperclip

name: carlyle
text: Hurrrgh

name: isarunasi
text: It shocked me. I am upset. Not because I don't like this strip. It is very strong emotionally. I am sad now because it made me feel so sorry for Roasted Beef. Poor guy :`(

name: greenkoolayd
text: he was THISCLOSE to getting some face sex!
